One day she notices that all the library books she has have been previously checked out by the same person: 'Seiji Amasawa'.","poster_path":"/5FROLD8zpWFs9ja7aYho1uOMJHg.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,18,10751],"popularity":50.609,"release_date":"1995-07-15","video":false,"vote_average":7.9,"vote_count":1915},{"backdrop_path":"/dalc1aMjUNIvTOVt5ZHt2zv6cm0.jpg","id":11621,"title":"Porco Rosso","original_title":"紅の豚","overview":"In Italy in the 1930s, sky pirates in biplanes terrorize wealthy cruise ships as they sail the Adriatic Sea. The only pilot brave enough to stop the scourge is the mysterious Porco Rosso, a former World War I flying ace who was somehow turned into a pig during the war. As he prepares to battle the pirate crew's American ace, Porco Rosso enlists the help of spunky girl mechanic Fio Piccolo and his longtime friend Madame Gina.","poster_path":"/8mIvSvnVBApfORL9N6S38Q7wD6A.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[10751,35,16,12],"popularity":50.145,"release_date":"1992-07-18","video":false,"vote_average":7.795,"vote_count":3178},{"backdrop_path":"/x5ufEAM7bS7DVXaovApamQh5BNE.jpg","id":37933,"title":"Tales from Earthsea","original_title":"ゲド戦記","overview":"Something bizarre has come over the land. The kingdom is deteriorating. People are beginning to act strange... What's even more strange is that people are beginning to see dragons, which shouldn't enter the world of humans. Due to all these bizarre events, Ged, a wandering wizard, is investigating the cause. During his journey, he meets Prince Arren, a young distraught teenage boy. While Arren may look like a shy young teen, he has a severe dark side, which grants him strength, hatred, ruthlessness and has no mercy, especially when it comes to protecting Teru. For the witch Kumo this is a perfect opportunity. She can use the boy's \"fears\" against the very one who would help him, Ged.","poster_path":"/y0VnJt4eRPMjA1hpJ8f1EFoVaSf.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,14,12],"popularity":35.387,"release_date":"2006-07-29","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":1274},{"backdrop_path":"/jsIxoKIuH6lLt4Y3NW7Tf1BwcIO.jpg","id":15080,"title":"Only Yesterday","original_title":"おもひでぽろぽろ","overview":"In lyrical switches between the present and the past, Taeko contemplates the arc of her life, and wonders if she has been true to the dreams of her childhood self.","poster_path":"/tOSnFE9e82iH3ZAzSTtuOkBsabJ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,18,10749],"popularity":37.885,"release_date":"1991-07-20","video":false,"vote_average":7.368,"vote_count":1057},{"backdrop_path":"/shqLeIkqPAAXM8iT6wVDiXUYz1p.jpg","id":12429,"title":"Ponyo","original_title":"崖の上のポニョ","overview":"When Sosuke, a young boy who lives on a clifftop overlooking the sea, rescues a stranded goldfish named Ponyo, he discovers more than he bargained for. Even though she's scolded, Patema's curiosity can't be held back. No one ever explained what the supposed danger was. On her usual trip to the \"danger zone,\" Patema faces unexpected events.
